artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Sasaki Toyokichi; Carver: Wada Yūjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 509.8; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 276.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: figure standing on top of a grey rock with water around it, looking down into water; figure wears white pants and purple and red blouse; large pink fish with yellow eyes, LRC
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Carver’s seal: 彫勇 {hori Yū}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Collection of Thirty-six Ghosts in New Style (Shinkei sanjūrokkaisen 新形三十六怪撰)
title: Picture of Oniwakamura Watching the Carp in the Pool
